head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HARTDEGEN, JOSEPH F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HARTDEGEN, JOSEPH F.

block.p: HARTDEGEN-Joseph F. On August 17, 2000. Beloved Husband of Catherine (nee Kane), Loving Brother of William J. and Frank J.; Devoted Uncle of Elizabeth Vran kovich, Paul, Kathryn, and Kristin Schoen. Funeral Monday 8:45 AM from The Marine Park Funeral Home, 3024 Quentin Rd, Brooklyn. Mass of Christian Burial 9:45 AM at St. Thomas Aquinas RC Church. Interment Greenwood Cemetery. Visiting Saturday and Sunday 2-5 and 7-10 PM.
